title: Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk, Blonde Ash
descriptions:
Introducing the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash, the perfect blend of style and functionality for your home or professional workspace.

With its generous 59-inch width, this desk provides ample space for all your office essentials. Crafted from durable medium-density fiberboard and finished with a sleek paper laminate, it offers both durability and a modern aesthetic. The beautiful Blonde Ash color adds a touch of elegance to any room.

Stay organized with the Realspace® Magellan desk's convenient storage options. It features a slide-out keyboard tray for easy access and four drawers in total. The file drawer is perfect for keeping important documents at your fingertips, while the three box drawers offer additional storage for smaller items. Plus, the inner drawer color may vary, adding a unique touch to your desk.

We understand the importance of durability, which is why this desk is designed to be scratch-resistant and water spill-resistant. Say goodbye to unsightly marks and stains, and enjoy a desk that looks as good as new for years to come.

Assembly is required, but don't worry - we provide clear instructions to guide you through the process. However, please note that due to its weight and size, it may be necessary to have more than one person handle the desk during assembly.

Rest assured that the Realspace® Magellan desk meets ANSI/BIFMA Performance Standards, ensuring its quality and durability. It has been tested and approved to provide you with a reliable and long-lasting workspace.

For your convenience, we also offer an in-home assembly service. If you prefer to have professionals handle the assembly, simply contact our dedicated team at 866-388-4350.

Upgrade your workspace with the Realspace® Magellan 59"W Manager's Computer Desk in Blonde Ash. Experience the perfect blend of style, functionality, and durability. Order yours today and take your office to the next level.
